welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Wildwood, a charming city known for its beautiful beaches and vibrant boardwalk. We are excited to have you here and invite you to discover the unique delights of our city. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lambert-St. Louis International Airport serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: East Terminal
terminals.description: The East Terminal at Lambert-St. Louis International Airport serves mainly domestic flights.

terminals.name: West Terminal
terminals.description: The West Terminal at Lambert-St. Louis International Airport serves mainly international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Spirit of St Louis Airport handles all commercial flights and is equipped with modern amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Spirit of St Louis Airport caters to private and charter flights, offering luxurious facilities for passengers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at St. Louis Downtown Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at St. Louis Downtown Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
